﻿This institution was established Sept. 15th, 1866, at the urgent request of the Bishop of the Diocese, Rt. Rev. John Quinlan, D.D., by the ladies of the Ursuline Order, whose convent and academy were burned at the capture of Columbia, S.C., during the late war.
